member

Summary
The list of members determines which users have access to a specific project. Although users are global, their roles, skills, and access may vary by project.

roleCode  longEnumCode
max length: 30
allows letters
allows digits
allows symbols 		required
enum
  		The member's role.

Manager, is allowed to manage project wide settings like members, the item catalog, and task setup.

Worker, has basic project access. Can view and update job, perform tasks, etc.

roleName  name
max length: 50
allows printable 		abstract
  		The member's role.

Manager, is allowed to manage project wide settings like members, the item catalog, and task setup.

Worker, has basic project access. Can view and update job, perform tasks, etc.  
uid  uid
max length: 30
allows printable 		primary key
required
  		The global unique key. This is a large hex-encoded number, and is usually not displayed to users. This is currently NOT a standard format, but is instead a format that we use internally.
